answers.answer: Every file we write in node is automatically wrapped in a module for us
We can export and import modules from one file to another so we don't have to rely on our index.html to import everything
Every node file has a built in exports object where we can assign keys to this object in order to export them to other file
Modules are automatically imported in Node so we don't need to use the require function to access other files

source.instructions: Which statement is NOT true about Node?
